Header: South African President touches down at Katunayake Airport
Content: South African President Cyril Ramaphosa arrived in the island on a sudden visit. The South African President suddenly arrived at the Katunayake International Airport while on his way home from Japan. It was to get fuel for his aircraft. The South African President was accompanied by eight senior officials of South Africa. The South Africa team clinched the 2019 Rugby World Cup. A brief ceremony was held at the Katunayake Airport on behalf of the South African |President who arrived in the island while on his way home after viewing the encounter held in Japan.
